column10: Driver looked left to turn right and then proceeded to turn out into the wrong side of the road; Driving on wrong side of road
column21: Driving on wrong side of road

column10: Speeding Maryland driver in black sedan/sports car blew the stop sign and turned from 2nd Rd N southbound onto Jackson right within inches of me as I was entering the crosswalk. I made contact his rear passenger door and yelled "hey," but he kept going.
